name: Crazy Car Simulator (Dunking Dog Games)
description:
This is an early prototype/sandbox/simulator featuring crazy physics and complete chaos! This project will be designed for those who want to race in crazy and/or awesome game environments and are passionate about building and expanding these worlds. 

Features:

  • 2 race cars and 3 monster trucks featuring realistic car physics
  • Basic obstacles, ramps, and barrels
  • Drifting and nitro boosting

If you like it, leave a comment with a feature request and I'll be more than happy to work on it!

All donations will go straight into further development and improvements of the game.
